enemies.name: Hollow Guard
enemies.description: A man who once protected the village. Now only hollow eye sockets remain.
enemies.description_ja: かつて村を守っていた男。今は空洞の眼窩だけが残る。
enemies.description_en: A man who once protected the village. Now only hollow eye sockets remain.

enemies.name: Crawling Shade
enemies.description: Something peeled from the wall. Formless hunger.
enemies.description_ja: 壁から剥がれた何か。形を持たぬ飢え。
enemies.description_en: Something peeled from the wall. Formless hunger.

enemies.name: Cursed Monk
enemies.description: A man petrified in prayer. Moves when approached.
enemies.description_ja: 祈りの姿勢のまま石化した男。近づくと動き出す。
enemies.description_en: A man petrified in prayer. Moves when approached.

enemies.name: Bone Collector
enemies.description: A humanoid woven from bones, wandering the catacombs.
enemies.description_ja: 地下墓地を徘徊する、骨で編まれた人型。
enemies.description_en: A humanoid woven from bones, wandering the catacombs.

enemies.name: Sealed Bishop
enemies.description: A being the villagers never speak of. Waits in the deepest catacomb. Lips sewn shut, yet eyes know the truth.
enemies.description_ja: 村人が決して語らぬ存在。地下聖堂の最奥で待つ。その口は縫い合わされ、眼だけが真実を知る。
enemies.description_en: A being the villagers never speak of. Waits in the deepest catacomb. Lips sewn shut, yet eyes know the truth.

enemies.name: Scrap Drone Swarm
enemies.description: Debris of broken scouts. Only the swarm instinct remains.
enemies.description_ja: 壊れた偵察機の残骸。群れで襲う本能だけが残る。
enemies.description_en: Debris of broken scouts. Only the swarm instinct remains.

enemies.name: Memory Glitch
enemies.description: Deleted data that has materialized. Touch it, and the past becomes unstable.
enemies.description_ja: 削除されたはずのデータが実体化したもの。触れると過去が乱れる。
enemies.description_en: Deleted data that has materialized. Touch it, and the past becomes unstable.

enemies.name: Rusted Sentinel
enemies.description: Sector security automaton. Power should be off, but something drives it.
enemies.description_ja: セクター警備の自動兵。動力は切れているはずだが、何かが動かしている。
enemies.description_en: Sector security automaton. Power should be off, but something drives it.

enemies.name: Echo Hunter
enemies.description: An entity tracking electronic traces of the dead. It remembers your death.
enemies.description_ja: 死者の電子痕跡を追う存在。お前の死を覚えている。
enemies.description_en: An entity tracking electronic traces of the dead. It remembers your death.

enemies.name: Core Prophet
enemies.description: A consciousness sleeping in the factory core. Has observed and recorded every loop. It tells you it has seen your death many times.
enemies.description_ja: 工場中枢に眠る意識体。全ての周回を観測し、記録し続けてきた。お前の死を何度も見たと告げる。
enemies.description_en: A consciousness sleeping in the factory core. Has observed and recorded every loop. It tells you it has seen your death many times.

enemies.name: Restless Villager
enemies.description: A villager who forgot how to die. Wanders endlessly.
enemies.description_ja: 死に方を忘れた村人。終わりなく彷徨う。
enemies.description_en: A villager who forgot how to die. Wanders endlessly.

enemies.name: Altar Wraith
enemies.description: A spirit bound to the ruined altar. Lashes out at the living.
enemies.description_ja: 崩れた祭壇に縛られた霊。生者を拒む。
enemies.description_en: A spirit bound to the ruined altar. Lashes out at the living.

enemies.name: Corrupted Drone
enemies.description: A maintenance drone infected with residual data. Erratic and dangerous.
enemies.description_ja: 残留データに汚染された整備ドローン。挙動が不安定。
enemies.description_en: A maintenance drone infected with residual data. Erratic and dangerous.

enemies.name: Data Phantom
enemies.description: A deleted record given form. It remembers being erased.
enemies.description_ja: 消去された記録が形を得たもの。消された記憶を持つ。
enemies.description_en: A deleted record given form. It remembers being erased.
